version_description:
Squashed a few bugs.

The GoDaddy app is your one-stop shop to put your idea online and watch it grow. Now, it’s a breeze to buy a domain name, then build & manage your website. Plus, get personalized tips on how to grow your online business.

1. Find the right domain
2. Create your website
3. Monitor your website performance
4. Gain personalized insights & grow online
5. Take care of your GoDaddy products

It’s the app to help any business build a successful online presence.

For further information or assistance, email us at appfeedback@godaddy.com.

Thanks for using GoDaddy App! We bring updates to the App regularly to make the experience even better.

What's included in the updates:
Bug fixes, stability improvements, and Product & UX enhancement.

For further information or assistance, email us at appfeedback@godaddy.com.

Thanks for using the GoDaddy app! We bring updates to the app regularly to make the experience even better. What's new with 2.0.0:

Now, with Push Notifications, keep up to date on important account notifications and prevent interruption. Receive updates on expiring products that require manual renewal.

Bug fixes, stability improvements and product enhancement.

For further information or assistance, email us at appfeedback@godaddy.com

Thanks for using the GoDaddy app! We bring updates to the app regularly to make the experience even better. Our previous update brought new functionality - Push Notifications that help keep you up to date on important account notifications and prevent interruption.

Here's what's new with 2.1.0:

- Bug fixes related to GoCentral website builder - Added missing UI elements and fixed errors related to uploading images
- Additional bug fixes related to stability improvements and product enhancement.

For further information or assistance, email us at appfeedback@godaddy.com

Thanks for using the GoDaddy app! We bring updates to the app regularly to make the experience even better.

What's included in this update:

• Get your new domain connected easily - we've added a new card to your home page to jump you right into setup of your domain
• Redesigned the home page to allow you to see all your websites and switch between them easily as well as included "Tips to Grow your website"
• Updated to a fresh new GoDaddy app icon making it easy to differentiate the app after you install on your device
• Plus, few bug fixes and stability improvements

For further information or assistance, email us at appfeedback@godaddy.com.

• Now, renew your domains much faster and easier with the simplified renewal experience.
• Minor Bug fixes and stability improvements

Some users experienced a fatal crash which is now fixed. Don't forget our previous update brought new functionality - Renewing domains became much easier now so you can ensure your business doesn't go down abruptly.

Thanks for using the GoDaddy app! For further information or assistance, email us at appfeedback@godaddy.com.

Fixed an issue where some users were seeing the app displayed in a different language instead of US English.

* Minor Bug fixes and stability improvements

Introducing GoDaddy 4.0, a completely new app designed for entrepreneurs like you who are looking to build & run an online business. Create and run a modern website, manage orders, requests and appointments on the go, and get found everywhere online.

Based on your feedback, we have redesigned the app to help you grow your business. We have streamlined the navigation and boosted performance while simplifying access to frequently used actions.

With the new GoDaddy app you can:

- Create and publish a modern website, with ecommerce features if you need it
- Find the perfect domain for your idea
- Run your business and track and act on customer orders, service bookings, or requests
- Quickly update your site with new photos, blog posts and new content sections and track site performance
- Connect with Facebook, Instagram, Yelp or Google pages and see activity in one place
- Manage your GoDaddy account and access help 24/7

Whether you're creating a new website or already have a GoDaddy site and looking for a mobile companion, this app is designed for you. We value your feedback and ideas for how we can provide you with the best experience. Share your feedback with us on appfeedback@godaddy.com

- Fixed issue where users were seeing certain content in a different language than English
- Made additional stabilization improvements

- Fixed issue where users were seeing certain content in a different language than English
- Made additional stabilization improvements

With this new version we have made signing into your account or creating new account a lot easier. Specifically,

- When signing in to the app, we have made inline validation errors a lot clearer.
- The new create account experience is much faster and easier to perform.
- We have also improved create account experience so you no longer need to reenter your sign in credentials. Simply pick up where you left off post account creation.
- First time face id or touch id opt in prompts is much easier to follow.
- Now sign in and create account supports dark mode.

Made additional UI and other stabilization improvements.

We value your feedback and ideas for how we can provide you with the best experience. Share your feedback with us on appfeedback@godaddy.com

This version includes a fix for a crash that some users would see when closing the website editor and account-based experiences.

We value your feedback and ideas for how we can provide you with the best experience. Share your feedback with us on appfeedback@godaddy.com

To help you adapt your business to these challenging times, we’ve pulled together key actions you can take to run your business online, even if your doors are closed. Now you can easily ,

- Keep your customers updated about changes to your site during this crisis
- Can't meet customers in person? Consider adding virtual services
- Add a banner to display your business status during the crisis
- Accept donations by adding GoFundMe to your site
- Give your customers an option to purchase gift cards

Made other fixes and stabilization improvements. We value your feedback and ideas for how we can provide you with the best experience. Share your feedback with us on appfeedback@godaddy.com

We are excited with this release to make the app available for users in Canada. Additionally, in this release we made few UI fixes and stabilization improvements.

We value your feedback and ideas for how we can provide you with the best experience. Share your feedback with us on appfeedback@godaddy.com

- With Push notifications, never miss an alert and get notified when a new order is made or when you receive a new booking request while on the go.
- Now Godaddy Domains include basic privacy protection for all eligible TLDs (exclusions apply). We redact the registrant's name, address, phone number and email in our WHOIS directory.
- Additionally, in this release we made few UI fixes and stabilization improvements.

We value your feedback and ideas for how we can provide you with the best experience. Share your feedback with us on appfeedback@godaddy.com

In this release, we’ve brought in a series of “under the hood” changes to create an even better customer experience for you. These changes include a persistent and accurate state of your website and improved syncing - meaning that updates made within the editor will be reflected quicker. In addition, you can now pull down to refresh the screen to show real time updates to stats and other changes made within your website.

Furthermore, this version includes several bug fixes and performance improvements.

- Fixed: You can once again add a new product to your website without a description. Product name and price are still required.
- New: We tweaked a few things that may be too small to notice but will improve the overall performance of the app.
